text: VDM may refer to: * VDM Metals, a producer of nickel alloys and stainless steels * VDM Publishing, a publishing group specializing in publishing German, French and English theses and dissertations * Van der Moolen N.V., a Dutch trading company * Verbi dei minister, an informal designation as a Christian minister * Vienna Development Method, a formal software development method * Value driven maintenance, industrial maintenance management methodology. * Virtual DOS machine * Vulnerability Discovery Model, used to estimate future vulnerability discovery process/trend
title: VDM
